page.title: 11MARKET AND SHOPS
page.content:
Every Friday we have a market.They sell lots of interesting things,we shall name some of them.
Food,records,shoes,cutlery,drinks, sweets,clothes,jewellery and sometimes we have a 55 pence stall.Any item on the stall costs 55 pence. If you go up the road you will come to Middleton street.They sell lots of nice things-here are some of them.
Papers,bread,drinks,pencils,pens,food, wool,cotton,toys,sweets and clothes. There are lots of other shops which sell the same sort of things.But they are not in Middleton Street.We also have a job centre.
